name: PuzzlesCave
description:
This is a slightly cute but brainstorming platform jump puzzle-solving game, you need to carefully observe to find the right route, get the key to open the door to the next gate.
After the hero is taken to the wonderful cave by the vortex of time and space, you will lead him to escape from this place.

- Support part of the gamepad, recommend using the gamepad experience
- Simple operation, just move forward and backward and jump
- Skillful movement between terrain
- Encourage choices among multiple routes on how to speed up customs clearance
